hours_text:
# Exhibitions

**CURRENT AND UPCOMING EXHIBITIONS**

Step into a world where art is for everyone. At the Art Gallery of Southwestern Manitoba, we bring the brushstrokes of history to life and connect you with the pulse of contemporary culture. Our exhibitions feature a dynamic mix of local and national talent, sparking conversations and new perspectives. Whether you’re a seasoned art enthusiast or just curious, there’s something here for you to discover. Join us and be part of the art that shapes our community.

## The Boy in the Forest

## Dustin Glaseman

The Boy in the Forest: a storybook collaboration project...

admission_text:
# Membership

## BECOME AN AGSM MEMBER TODAY

Join the AGSM and enjoy the many benefits of being a gallery member! By doing so, you will have the opportunity to deepen your knowledge and understanding of the visual arts, meet others who share your passion for art in all its forms, and you will also be helping to support high-quality programming that contributes to a culturally vibrant community.

**To join the AGSM, you can sign up by calling us at 204.727.1036, clicking the buttons below, or coming by in person!**

##### **Supporting the AGSM with any level of Membership gives you exclusive access to:**

  * Advance notice of new exhibitions, public programming, and special events
  * **Early registration and special discount** pricing on art classes and workshops offered in our **[Art School](https://agsm.ca/classes/)**
  * Access to our scheduled **Open Drawing Studios** and **Open Painting Studios** to engage with other artists
  * Join the [**Free Flow Artist Collective**](https://agsm.ca/free-flow-artist-collective/) meetings to consult and critique your work with other artists
  * 10% discount off your purchase at the [**AGSM Gift Shop**](https://agsm.ca/gift-shop/)
  * 10% off art supplies at [Janzen’s Paint & Decorating](https://www.janzenspaint.com/art-supplies)
  * Voting privileges at our **Annual General Meeting**
  * A **Patron Membership** gains additional access to a [NARM Membership](https://narmassociation.org/)
  * Main Gallery exhibition opportunities in t...
